description: Creates the specified WorkSpace bundle. For more information about creating WorkSpace bundles, see Create a Custom WorkSpaces Image and Bundle.

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The identifier of the image that is used to create the bundle.

parameters.name: ComputeType
parameters.description: Describes the compute type of the bundle. Name (string) --- The compute type.

parameters.name: UserStorage
parameters.description: Describes the user volume for a WorkSpace bundle. The size of the user volume.

nested_params.name: Capacity
nested_params.description: The size of the user volume.

parameters.name: RootStorage
parameters.description: Describes the root volume for a WorkSpace bundle. The size of the root volume.

nested_params.name: Capacity
nested_params.description: The size of the root volume.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags associated with the bundle. (dict) --- Describes a tag. The key of the tag. Value (string) --- The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the bundle. This is the account identifier of the owner, or AMAZON if the bundle is provided by Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the image that was used to create the bundle.

nested_items.name: RootStorage
nested_items.description: The size of the root volume.

nested_items.name: Capacity
nested_items.description: The size of the root volume.

nested_items.name: UserStorage
nested_items.description: The size of the user volume.

nested_items.name: Capacity
nested_items.description: The size of the user volume.

nested_items.name: ComputeType
nested_items.description: The compute type of the bundle. For more information, see Amazon WorkSpaces Bundles.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the bundle was updated.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the bundle was created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the WorkSpace bundle.
